1370: Linnea moved to De Tuyt.B.1 after marriage.
Got married to Lambrecht at age 19 in 1370.
Gave birth to Radwardo in 1370 at age 19.
1371: Gave birth to Marcibilia in 1371 at age 20.
1372: Gave birth to Margareta in 1372 at age 21.
1373: Gave birth to Lutgeri in 1373 at age 22.
1374: Gave birth to Hersewindis in 1374 at age 23.
1376: Gave birth to Liedelde in 1376 at age 25.
1381: Gave birth to Hylonus in 1381 at age 30.
1382: Gave birth to Kerstiaen in 1382 at age 31.
1386: Gave birth to Folpertus in 1386 at age 35.
1387: Gave birth to Nellen in 1387 at age 36.
Lost son Radwardo when Radwardo was 18 years old.
1389: Lost daughter Liedelde when Liedelde was 14 years old.
1391: Lost daughter Hersewindis when Hersewindis was 17 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
